body: Kind of a dumb story that isn't ntr maybe future volumes might become ntr ... would be nice if underdog ntrd the bigger guy but ... those stories are so rare its unlikely.

知道原版被自己寫爛
這樣改咗還可以

This is not NTR and it never was. Ha ha ha; Mainly because, the protagonist at no time was in an intimate or non-intimate relationship with the one who should be considered the 3rd protagonist, which is the one who was made "NTR". The second would be the man who is paired with the protagonist who is the woman
